meanings.sent1: After their argument, their reengagements were filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent2: The reengagements between the old friends brought back many happy memories.
meanings.sent3: The reengagements between the siblings always ended in a tickle fight.
meanings.sent4: Her reengagements with painting were like rediscovering a lost passion.
meanings.sent5: The reengagements with nature refreshed her soul and inspired her creativity.

meanings.definition: The state of being engaged again.
meanings.sent1: The reengagements of the couple after their fight were heartfelt and sincere.
meanings.sent2: Their reengagements showed a deep commitment to each other.
meanings.sent3: The reengagements of the students in the group project led to a successful presentation.
meanings.sent4: The reengagements of the team members boosted morale and productivity.
meanings.sent5: The reengagements of the community members strengthened their bonds and unity.
